channel.title: Research on Nathaniel Saul | Around About
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Nathaniel Saul | Around About

item.title: Galaxy classification
item.description: I was awarded a NASA space grant through WSU to develop methods using Topological Data Analysis for classifying galaxies that have WR-bumps or not. More information about this project will be coming soon.

item.title: Persim
item.description: I work on Persim, a library for persistence images in Python that can be used with Dionysus or Ripser.

item.title: Ripser
item.description: I work on Ripser, more specifically, the Python wrapper of Ripser.
